phase.text: Hi there! You must be the SWS agent that Digg mentioned!

userResponse.option: You're looking at one of the best agents in the force!

phase.text: Great, we could use some protection around here. This is the temple...and up there, that's the guard.

userResponse.option: How long has he been up there?

phase.text: You bet. We'd better keep out of sight, because if he sees us, we're toast!

userResponse.option: Does he ever leave his post?

phase.text: He's been up there for days. I don't think he ever sleeps! He's always on watch.

userResponse.option: Have you seen anyone going into the temple?
Do you have any clue what he's guarding?

phase.text: We have no idea, but whoever's behind all this, they're up to no good!

userResponse.option: Have you seen anyone suspicious talking to the guard?
When is the last time you saw anyone go inside the temple?

phase.text: Actually, there was someone here not too long ago. The guard let a very strange-looking Bin Weevil inside, carrying something under his arm.

userResponse.option: It must be the Bin Pet kidnapper! I've got to get inside that temple!
We have to find a way past that guard so I can chase that Evil Weevil down!

phase.text: I swear, the guard never moves from that ledge, you'll have to distract him somehow.

userResponse.option: I'm an SWS agent, I'll find a way.
Do you know how to open that locked door he's watching?

phase.text: Look around and see if there's something you could use to create a distraction.

userResponse.option: I'm sure I can come up with something. But how will I get inside?
I'll still need to open that door, and it looks like it's locked tight.

phase.text: Once you get to the door, you can open it with a secret code. The guard taps the code into that panel when he opens the door, but it's too far away to see... I hope you've got some binoculars!

userResponse.option: Thanks for your help - I'd better get to work on a distraction contraption!
You've been a great help. Now watch an awesome agent in action!

phase.text: I'll be here if you need me...but remember, DON'T let that guard see you, or you'll be in trouble!
phase.textOnReturn: Make sure you've looked everywhere for items that could help you distract that guard. I hope you've got some binoculars to spot that code!

phase.text: My favourite agent! So glad to see you back. You can explore to your heart's content! I'm going to stay here and keep an eye on things.
